mapper.select: select uid, ctrb_uid, sum(sum_gold) as sumGold, create_time, update_time from stat_room_ctrb_sum where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by ctrb_uid order by sumGold desc limit 0, 10

select uid, send_uid as ctrbUid, SUM(sum_gold) as sumGold, create_time, update_time from one_day_room_send_sum where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (create_time BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) GROUP BY send_uid ORDER BY sumGold desc limit 20

select uid, recv_uid as ctrbUid, SUM(sum_gold) as sumGold, create_time, update_time from one_day_room_recv_sum where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (create_time BETWEEN #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) GROUP BY recv_uid ORDER BY sumGold desc limit 20
